overview:
Vassilis Bakopoulos is a Digital Strategist and Entrepreneur.

His current role is Vice President / Group Director @ Digitas in New York.

Before that he was a founding partner at mbriyo.com, an incubator for new technology startups.

Over the last 12 years Vassilis has worked in multiple geographies and industries, covering management consulting, brand identity, communications, consumer insights and digital media.

He has advised multi-billion brands but also small pre-seed startups in areas of marketing strategy and innovation.

He has also served on the advisory board of a number of companies, including m2cmedia (digital signage in Greece), mirus + partners and mbriyo.com.

Vassilis holds an MBA in Finance and Banking and a Bsc in Economics.
